Title: Relates to establishing the canine officer health monitoring fund
Summary: Establishes the canine officer health monitoring fund which allows for applicants to request reimbursement from the division of criminal justice services for health costs related to regular health or injury associated with canine officers.
LawCode: Add ยง837-d-1, amd ยง837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the canine officer health monitoring fund
